long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OpenGPTs- Powerful GPTs Colipot, AI Automation Assistant, AI Painting, Multi-Agent, ChatGPT, Midjourney

Why Choose This Plugin? ❓

Despite the plethora of ChatGPT plugins already available on the market, including some exceptional ones, our experiences highlighted numerous areas ripe for enhancement. Thus, this plugin was conceived.

Amidst the explosive growth of AI technology, companies like OPENAI are at the forefront of the AI revolution wave🌊. As developers, our goal is to facilitate quicker access to AI technology for users, enabling them to leverage AI to enhance work efficiency. This, in turn, allows for more quality time with family and opportunities for self-learning and growth👨‍👩‍👧‍👦📚.

As an open-source project, you're invited to explore our code on Github👩‍💻🔍. If you appreciate our work, please consider giving us a Star!
GitHub: https://github.com/hzeyuan/OpenGPTS
Official Website: https://open-gpts.vercel.app/

Features at a Glance:

SidePanel: An AI-assisted chat panel that addresses your queries while you browse, providing insights and answers on-the-go💡.
Instant Screenshot Analysis: Capture any screen content and let AI dissect and analyze it for you🖼️🔍.
Text Selection Summarization: Select any text for a quick AI-powered summary, boosting your reading and comprehension efficiency📖✨.
Multi-Window Conversations: Engage in dialogues with multiple GPTs simultaneously for diverse perspectives on a single question🗣️👥.
Side-by-Side Operation: Access ChatGPT from any tab without switching, thanks to our sidebar feature, simplifying multitasking👩‍💻🚀.
Internet-Enhanced GPT: Combines GPT with internet search capabilities to reduce hallucinations and enhance real-world relevance🌐🔗.
Coming Soon:

Web Operator: Automate website navigation and repetitive tasks, lightening your digital workload🖥️🤖.
Privacy Guarantee:
Your privacy and data security are our top priorities🔒. In OpenGPTs, we take special care to respect and protect your privacy. To ensure the proper handling of your information, we transparently list the permissions we require and their specific uses:

Webpage Access Permission: Allows the plugin to offer real-time AI assistance and content analysis as you navigate web pages, with a strict policy against collecting your browsing history or personal data🌐👀.
Clipboard Access Permission: Enables the plugin to read and modify clipboard content for quick summarizations or text analyses, activated only upon your direct engagement with these features📋✂️.
Empower your daily routines with OpenGPTs as your smart assistant, accelerating work and learning for a more efficient, AI-enhanced lifestyle🌟.
